DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe a method of medical imaging that is different from the options that exist.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.__Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
